entry.p: This evening I translated a few more fragments of Epicurus, specifically numbers 34, 35, and 37 in the collection known as the Vatican Sayings. I'm especially satisfied with my rendering of #34, because I feel that it captures Epicurus' pun on the Greek word χρεία…

blockquote.p: The use of friends is not that they are useful, but that we can trust in their usefulness.

entry.p: I'm still hoping to finish my translation of the Vatican Sayings by the end of the year…
